languageTools.program.agent.msc

Interface MentalFormula

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AGoalLiteral, BelLiteral, GoalALiteral, GoalLiteral, Macro, MentalLiteral, TrueLiteral

    public interface MentalFormula
    Abstraction of a MentalLiteral and a Macro, to facilitate storing Macros in MentalStateConditions.
    Author:
    N.Kraayenbrink
